amendment.description: An amendment numbered 111 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to reduce funding for "overseas humanitarian, disaster, and civic aid" to be in line with the administration's budget request, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate the account for Overseas Humanitarian, Disaster, and Civic Aid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 63 - 365 (Roll no. 204).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 63 - 365 (Roll no. 204).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
